com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.factory.json

Class AbstractJsonModelFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.factory.json.AbstractJsonModelFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of model this factory produces.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessTokenJsonFactory, CampaignJsonFactory, CategoryJsonFactory, CauseAffiliationJsonFactory, ClaimJsonFactory, CreditCardJsonFactory, ErrorJsonFactory, InterstitialJsonFactory, LocationCreditJsonFactory, LocationJsonFactory, LoyaltyJsonFactory, OrderJsonFactory, PaymentTokenJsonFactory, UserJsonFactory

    @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public abstract class AbstractJsonModelFactory<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for JSON parsers that create model objects using a factory design pattern. Any model object that wishes to be parsed from JSON should have an implementation of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractJsonModelFactory(java.lang.String typeKey)
      Constructs a new factory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T from(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
      Parse a model from the JSON object passed, un-nesting from a root element if necessary.
      java.util.List<T> fromList(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray)
      Parse a list of models from the JSON array passed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractJsonModelFactory

        public AbstractJsonModelFactory(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String typeKey)
        Constructs a new factory.
        Parameters:
        typeKey - the key which the object to parse can be nested under. It will usually be the name of the object's type: 
                    { 'typeKey' : { 'field1': 'test' } }.
        When requesting a single object or a list of objects, the object will be nested under this type key. When you are parsing an object as a field of another object, it will not be nested under a type key.

    • Method Detail

      • fromList

        @NonNull
public final java.util.List<T> fromList(@NonNull
                                 org.json.JSONArray jsonArray)
                                 throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a list of models from the JSON array passed.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the jsonArray to parse from.
        Returns:
        a List of model instances.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if any of the models fail to parse.

      • from

        @NonNull
public final T from(@NonNull
             org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
             throws org.json.JSONException
        Parse a model from the JSON object passed, un-nesting from a root element if necessary.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the JSON representation of the model to parse.
        Returns:
        a model instance.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the model fails to parse.
